    $value[1]['details']
    𝗣𝗔𝗬𝗠𝗘𝗡𝗧 𝗧𝗘𝗥𝗠𝗦:

➤ For guaranteed booking, a reservation/downpayment of 90% per person is required. The remaining balance should be paid via our bank accounts or GCash at least 3 days before the travel dates. 

➤ The Reservation/downpayment will be deducted to your total rate. Reservation is non-refundable but rebookable.

𝗣𝗟𝗘𝗔𝗦𝗘 𝗕𝗘 𝗔𝗗𝗩𝗜𝗦𝗘𝗗:
✹ Please note that the rates provided here are not fixed and do not apply during  Special Holidays, Long Weekends, Peak Season, December, and Holy Week. Rates are subject to change without prior notice.

✹ Additionally, the rates do not include taxes. If you require a service invoice, an additional 12% VAT will be applied based on the total amount. However, if you only request a carbonized Acknowledgment Receipt, we can issue it free of charge. Please be aware that any shipping costs for receipts will be the responsibility of the client.

Call us if you have any questions: 📞0976-4764187 or call us here on messenger simply click the phone icon 📞 above on the right side!

📧 or email us at book@vantripperstravelandtour.com

🌐Check out our FB Page for more details: https://www.facebook.com/Vantrippers.ph

📩Shoot us a message: m.me/vantrippers.ph
